pageContext.claim: “The IRS treats me just like they used to treat the Tea Party except worse. And I'm under tax audit. I have been for a long period of time. We made a deal a long time ago and once I ran for politics, that deal was like -- we didn't make it. So I'm under a continuing audit.”
pageContext.analysis: Every president, as a matter of course, has their tax returns audited. Every president since Nixon has publicly released their tax returns even as the audit is ongoing.
